publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4814.1# George Foulkes: Bausch and Lomb Job losses in Livingston—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4814) in the name of Angela Constance, leave out from "is concerned" to "2006" and insert " urges it to reconsider this decision; meanwhile, ".

S3M-4814.1# Bausch and Lomb Job losses in Livingston (lodged on 23 September 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, David Whitton*, Hugh Henry*, John Park*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*

S3M-4814.1# George Foulkes: Bausch and Lomb Job losses in Livingston—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4814) in the name of Angela Constance, leave out from "is concerned" to "2006" and insert " urges it to reconsider this decision; meanwhile, ". Supported by: Patricia Ferguson, David Whitton, Hugh Henry, John Park, Mr Frank McAveety, Marilyn Livingstone, Mary Mulligan, Des McNulty, Rhona Brankin*, James Kelly*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4814.1# Bausch and Lomb Job losses in Livingston (lodged on 23 September 2009) Karen Gillon*
